senses.sense_definition: A worker in a wool mill responsible for supplying rolls of wool to a specific machine known as a slubbing billy.

examples.text: The young <w>piecener</w> ran back and forth carrying fresh rolls of wool to keep the machine running.
In the noisy factory, the <w>piecener</w> had to be quick to ensure the slubbing billy never ran out of material.

senses.sense_definition: A textile worker whose job is to repair broken yarn threads by twisting the ends together.

examples.text: Whenever a thread snapped during spinning, the <w>piecener</w> deftly joined the ends to maintain production.
The <w>piecener</w> used a quick rolling motion of the fingers to fix the broken yarn without stopping the machine.
